mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.address AS "address", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user createBy ON createBy.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updateBy ON updateBy.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dk_member a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.mobile LIKE '%'||#{mobile}||'%' '%'+#{mobile}+'%' concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_member( id, name, mobile, address, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{address}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dk_member SET name = #{name}, mobile = #{mobile}, address = #{address}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dk_contract c INNER JOIN dk_member a ON c.member_id = a.id WHERE c.review_status = '9' AND DATE_FORMAT(c.review_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{0} AND DATE_FORMAT(c.review_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{1} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY c.review_time DESC
